title: ADE20K Semantic Segmentation
description: Comprehensive scene parsing with 150 semantic categories (Zhou et al., CVPR 2017). Annotate indoor and outdoor scenes with pixel-level labels covering objects, parts, and stuff classes.
citation:
@inproceedings{zhou2017scene,
    title = "Scene Parsing through {ADE20K} Dataset",
    author = "Zhou, Bolei  and Zhao, Hang  and Puig, Xavier  and Fidler, Sanja  and Barriuso, Adela  and Torralba, Antonio",
    booktitle = "Proceedings of the IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition",
    pages = "633--641",
    year = "2017",
    url = "https://arxiv.org/abs/1608.05442"
}
